ai_sprite.name: gentleman
ai_sprite.dialog: I wish I could be like Moroni.

ai_sprite.name: gentleman
ai_sprite.dialog: I don't know why this empty house is just sitting here.

ai_sprite.name: ammah
ai_sprite.dialog: I am Ammah and this is Manti. We wish to join your army, if you will have us.

ai_sprite.name: manti
ai_sprite.dialog: I am Manti and this is Ammah. We wish to join your army, if you will have us.

ai_sprite.name: woman
ai_sprite.dialog: My family joined the Order of the Nehors. They're giving all their money to the preachers, and they keep persecuting me and others for not believing as they do. I wish I knew what to do.

ai_sprite.name: merchant
ai_sprite.dialog: Hello. I am no warrior but a simple merchant who has had some good fortune. If it will further your cause, I want you to accept this small gift so you can buy weapons and prepare for battle. You received 200 senines of gold and 1000 rations.
